definition: 「にんき」: popularity; popular feeling; business conditions
「ぜんこく」: countrywide; nationwide; whole country
「じょうほう」: information; news; intelligence
「げんざい」: now; current; present
「しょうひん」: commodity; article of commerce; goods
「こじん」: individual; private person; personal
「ていき」: fixed period; fixed term; regular
「かんり」: control; management (e.g. of a business)
「じゅうよう」: important; momentous; essential
「さくひん」: work (e.g. book, film, composition, etc.); opus; performance
「じょうけん」: condition; conditions; term
「だいひょう」: representative; representation; delegation
「かつどう」: action; activity; movie (esp. during the silent movie period)
「さいこう」: highest; supreme; the most
「えいぎょう」: business; trade; sales
「たしょう」: more or less; somewhat; a little
「たいしょう」: target; object (of worship, study, etc.); subject (of taxation, etc.)
「でんし」: electron; (esp. as a prefix) electronic; electronics
「せいひん」: manufactured goods; finished goods; product
「ようきゅう」: demand; firm request; requisition
「じんせい」: (human) life (i.e. conception to death)
「しょうじょ」: little girl; maiden; young lady
「じどう」: automatic; self-motion; intransitive verb
「しょくひん」: food; food products; foodstuffs
「じょうきょう」: state of affairs (around you); situation; circumstances
「きねん」: commemoration; celebration; honoring the memory of something
「てんねん」: nature; spontaneity  ; natural airhead
「じょうたい」: current status; condition; situation
「たんじょう」: birth; creation; formation
